org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.process
Class AeProcessWrapper

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.process.AeProcessWrapper
public class AeProcessWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

Wraps a process with its reference count and state.

Parameters:

Method Detail

acquireMutex

public void acquireMutex()
Acquires process mutex, blocking if necessary until the current owner relinquishes ownership.

adjustCountWithYield

protected void adjustCountWithYield(int aDelta)
A debugging routine that modifies the reference count by the given amount with an interposing call to Thread.yield(). This makes it easier to shake out problems with the way the reference count is used in a multi-threaded environment.

decrementCount

public int decrementCount()
Decrements the reference count and returns the new effective reference count.

Returns:
int

getCompletedJournalIds

public AeLongSet getCompletedJournalIds()
Returns journal entry ids to delete when process state is next saved.

getCompletedTransmissionIds

public AeLongSet getCompletedTransmissionIds()
Returns:
set of durable/persistent invoke transmission ids to be deleted when the process state is next saved.

getCount

public int getCount()
Returns the current effective reference count, which is the actual reference count plus possibly one more artificial reference to keep non-persistent processes in memory.

Returns:
int

getMutex

protected AeMutex getMutex()
Returns process mutex.

Returns the process persistence type.
